SEARCH
Package com.monexel.expensetracker.controller

Class DashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.monexel.expensetracker.controller.DashboardController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/dashboard") public class DashboardController extends Object
REST controller for providing dashboard summary data. This controller exposes endpoints to retrieve expense dashboard summaries for a user, optionally filtered by a date range.

@author Surya Narayanan G

Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getDashboardSummary

      @GetMapping("/getDashboardSummary/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DashboardResponse> getDashboardSummary(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate startDate, @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE) LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves the dashboard summary for a specific user. If no start and end dates are provided, defaults to the current month.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose dashboard summary is requested
      startDate - optional start date for filtering (ISO format: yyyy-MM-dd)
      endDate - optional end date for filtering (ISO format: yyyy-MM-dd)
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the DashboardResponse with summary details Example: 
       GET /api/dashboard/getDashboardSummary/1?startDate=2025-11-01invalid input: '&endDate'=2025-11-30
